means: 指定（款项等）作某种用途

sentence.Network_en: The government is ready to allot houses in that area.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府准备在那个地区分配住房.

sentence.Network_en: Enquiries are so large that we can only than allot you 200 cases.
sentence.Network_cn: 询盘如此之多,我们只能分给你们200箱货.

sentence.Network_en: Customization – Allot skill points towards tracking, stealth lures, or weapon proficiency.
sentence.Network_cn: 定制--技能点分配于跟踪 、 隐形诱惑, 或武器熟练的能力.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... allocate 分配，把。划归 allot 分配；拨给 almond 杏仁.
博士英语词汇经典 - 豆丁网 ... allocate 分派, 分配 120 allot (按份额)分配, 分派 121 allow 允许, 承认 122.
《牛津英汉词典》全集完整版TXT电子书 - 豆丁网 ... allocation n. 分配 allot v. 分配，配给 allotment n. 分配，份额.
调字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 调派〖 dispatch;send;assign〗 调配〖 allocate;deploy;distribute;allot〗 调遣〖 dispatch;assign〗.

list.abs: (RMB) 期限 Allotted time 收费标准(元) Standard of charges (R M B) 收费依据 Foundation of charges 不满一年 Valid within one year 400 财综〔2004〕60.
房地产英语---淘房屋 ... financial budget 财政预算 fiscal allotment 财政拨款 floor area 建筑面积.
土地承载能力 Land carrying capacity土地分配 Land allotment土地恢复 Land restoration
allotment 分配；配股allotment notice 股份配售通知；配股通知allotment of shares 股份分配
allotment 分配；配股allotment notice 股份配售通知；配股通知allotment of shares 股份分配

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Old French aloter, from a- (from Latin ad 'to') + loter 'divide into lots'

encyclopedia.content: Allot通讯公司成立于1997年在以色列的特拉维夫成立，公司于2006年11月在美国NASDAQ上市（股票代号：ALLT）。 Allot公司的“基于策略的网络技术（Policy-Based Networking）” 概念为企业与IP 服务提供商提供了一套改善网络性能的整体解决方案。该解决方案可以控制并减缓那些非商业性的应用，同时对某些关键的、紧迫的、时间敏感的应用加以保证。

entry.def: If something is allotted to someone, it is given to them as their share.

example.ex: The seats are allotted to the candidates who have won the most votes...
example.tran: 席位被分配给了赢得选票最多的候选人。

example.ex: We were allotted half an hour to address the committee.
example.tran: 给了我们半个小时向委员会作陈述。

means.word_mean: 3. administer or bestow, as in small portions;

sentences.sentence: "shell out pocket money for the children"

auth_sentence.content: Ten years I will allot to the attainment of knowledge.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ten years I will allot to the attainment of knowledge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ten years I will allot to the attainment of knowledge.

auth_sentence.content: I actually think it has allot to do with hormones.
auth_sentence.res_content: I actually think it has allot to do with hormones.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I actually think it has allot to do with hormones.

auth_sentence.content: See how the Fates their gifts allot, For A is happysB is not.
auth_sentence.res_content: See how the Fates their gifts allot, For A is happysB is not.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: See how the Fates their gifts allot, For A is happysB is not.

abbreviation.mean_cn: (股票，债券等向认购人的)分配，(土地的)划拨，拨款

means.word_mean: 分配，配给（时间、钱财等）；分派（任务等）；拨给；摊派

sentences.en: Each passenger slept on the berth allotted to him.
sentences.cn: 每个旅客都睡在分配给他的铺位上。

jushi.english: The Municipality allotted a plot of grounds for a new school.
jushi.chinese: 市政府拨了一块地来兴建校舍。

jushi.english: I allotted six dollars for bus fare and twenty dollars for lunch each month.
jushi.chinese: 我每月分6元作车费,20元作午餐费。

jushi.english: A fixed time is allotted for each question.
jushi.chinese: 每个问题都限定回答时间。
